pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 32     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Desert Village $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Cactus     $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Can be equipped with a $(item)Saddle$() and ridden by up to two $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() on land or in water up to 3 blocks deep. $(thing)Camels$() are tall enough that most melee hostile mobs cannot reach the players to attack them. They have the ability of 'dashing'. When dashing, the $(thing)Camel$() launches up to 12 blocks forward and one block upward.
